summary: This bill, the Enhance Access To SNAP Act of 2025 (EATS Act of 2025), aims to amend the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 to remove certain student eligibility restrictions for the Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program (SNAP).  It redefines household eligibility to include students enrolled at least half-time in recognized educational institutions. The bill also makes conforming amendments throughout the Act and other related laws, finally taking effect on January 2, 2026.
